description.value:
Aura 2

At the start of the spell weaver's turn, it gains temporary hit points equal to the level of the highest level magic item within the aura.

Basic Attack

At-Will ✦ Force

Standard

+11 vs Reflex; 1d6+3 force damage, and the target takes ongoing 5 force damage (save ends).

Basic Attack

At-Will ✦ Lightning, Thunder

Minor, At-Will

Ranged 10

+11 vs Fortitude; 1d6+3 lightning damage, and the target is blinded (save ends), and each creature adjacent to the target takes 1d6+3 thunder damage.

At-Will ✦ Teleportation

Minor, At-Will

+11 vs Reflex; the target disappears to a place where it can see reflections of itself in every direction (save ends). While there, the target cannot target any creature or be targeted by any creature. When the target saves, he returns to his previous space, or the nearest unoccupied space.

At-Will ✦ Force

Minor, At-Will

+11 vs Reflex; 2d6+4 force damage, and push the target 5 squares.

Recharge 5-6 ✦ Healing, Psychic

Minor

Ranged 5

Bloodied arcane targets only; +13 vs Will; 1d8+9 psychic damage, and the target is dazed (save ends). Miss: Half damage. Effect: The spell weaver regains 24 hit points.

At-Will ✦ Fire

Minor, At-Will

Ranged 10

+11 vs Reflex; 1d8+4 fire damage, and the target is immobilized and each creature adjacent to the target at the start of the target's turn takes 1d8 + 4 fire damage (save ends).

At-Will ✦ Charm, Psychic

Minor, At-Will

Ranged 10

+11 vs Will; 1d6+3 psychic damage, and the target is dazed and attacks the nearest creature with its standard action on its turn (save ends both).

At-Will ✦ Cold

Minor, At-Will

Close blast 3

+11 vs Fortitude; 1d6+3 cold damage, and slide the target 1 square.

At-Will

Immediate Reaction

Trigger: When the spell weaver takes damage

The spell weaver takes a minor action or a move action.
When dazed, a spell weaver takes a standard action and a minor action on its turn, instead of just a standard action, and can still take immediate actions.

system.biography:
HP 312; Bloodied 156Init +5 | AP 2 | Save +5
AC 21Fort 17Ref 21Will 21
Speed 6, teleport 6
Ability ScoresStr 10 (+3)
Con 14 (+5)		Dex 14 (+5)
Int 20 (+8)		Wis 16 (+6)
Cha 16 (+6)
Languages telepathy (sight)
Alignment Unaligned
Skills Arcana +18, Insight +16Senses
Passive Perception 16 | Insight 26

Equipment robes, chromatic disk
